etomica.virial

Class MCMoveClusterTorsionAlkaneEH

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.integrator.mcmove.MCMove
      • etomica.integrator.mcmove.MCMoveBox
        • etomica.integrator.mcmove.MCMoveBoxStep
          • etomica.integrator.mcmove.MCMoveMolecule
            • etomica.virial.MCMoveClusterTorsionAlkaneEH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MCMoveMolecular, MCMoveStepDependent

    public class MCMoveClusterTorsionAlkaneEH
extends MCMoveMolecule
    MC move for alkane-TraPPE-EH torsion pick up carbons in the box only, but move update all the atoms(carbons and hydrogens)

        nAtoms - number of atoms to move in a trial. Number of atoms in box should be at least one greater than this value (greater because first atom is never moved)

        public boolean doTrial()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Method to perform trial move. Returns false if the trial could not be attempted, for example if there were no molecules in the box and the trial is designed to displace an atom; returns true otherwise.

      • rejectNotify

        public void rejectNotify()
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Method called by IntegratorMC in the event that the most recent trial move is rejected. This method should cause the system to be restored to the condition before the most recent call to doTrial.
        Overrides:
        rejectNotify in class MCMoveMolecule

      • getB

        public double getB()
        Description copied from class: MCMoveMolecule
        Returns the log of the limiting-distribution probabilities of states, ln(Pj/Pi), for the states encountered before (i) and after (j) the most recent call to doTrial.
        Overrides:
        getB in class MCMoveMolecule

      • getA

        public double getA()
        Description copied from class: MCMoveMolecule
        Returns log of the ratio of the trial probabilities, ln(Tij/Tji) for the states encountered before (i) and after (j) the most recent call to doTrial(). Tij is the probability that this move would generate state j from state i, and Tji is the probability that a subsequent call to doTrial would return to state i from state j.
        Overrides:
        getA in class MCMoveMolecule
